name: Reincarnated On Bird Island Nexus
description:
In Reincarnated On Bird Island Nexus you are summoned to a new world to farm resources for a God with somewhat questionable ethics. Through the help of the bird friends you create you will be able to gain enough money for that Goddess in no time at all! 

This is an idle type game, where you collect resources for yourself early on, and automate things through the use of ai. 

AI Types

Lumberjack-
Chops wood and stores it in a Wood Pile

Stone Miner-
Mines stone and stores it in a Stone Pile

Iron Miner-
Mines iron and stores it in an Iron Pile

Fisherbird-
Collects fish from Fish Traps and stores them in a Fish Rack

Farmer-
Collects corn from a Plant Box and stores it in a Silo

Smelter-
Collects iron from Iron Ore Pile, stores it in a Furnace, and puts the ingots in an Iron Ingot Box

Banker-
Collects from various storages and stores items in a Bank(Bank is tied to players inventory)

Instructions for download:

1. Download the zip file

2. Unzip the file

3. Open the exe

4. Enjoy!
